brand_story.doc_title: Furbo Dog Camera Brand Story | Learn About Furbo | Furbo Dog Camera

key_visual.title: Share more love and moments together.

our_story.text1: Every morning when we leave home for work, our dog would give us those sad puppy eyes that break our heart as we shut the door behind us. It feels awful, but we simply don’t have any other choice.
our_story.text2: We started talking to more dog parents and discovered that they had this same pain of leaving their dogs at home alone. They shared their stories with us about how they couldn’t bear to be apart from their dogs for too long, and they even skipped vacations because they couldn’t bring their dogs along.
our_story.text3: One dog parent’s comment really struck us:
our_story.quote: “Dogs spend most of their lives waiting for us at home.”
our_story.text4: We’re always apart from our furbabies, but all we ever wanted is to always be together. That’s why we set out on a mission to create a simple way for us to always be together with our dogs.

0.text:
JUNE 2014: The Furbo idea is born.

JULY 2014: Concept testing & market research.

DECEMBER 2014: First 3D-printed prototype.

1.text:
MARCH 2015: Toss treats instead of drop treats because users say “it’s more fun.”

APRIL 2015: Night vision is important because “sometimes we have to work late.”

SEPTEMBER 2015: Added barking alert so we know when our furbaby needs attention.

OCTOBER 2015: Finished interview with 500 users.

2.text:
APRIL 2016: The world meets Furbo Dog Camera.

JUNE 2016: The most successful pet tech project on crowdfunding ($510,000+ USD funds raised).

SEPTEMBER 2016: Available in 5 countries. (US, UK, CA, JP, & TW).

DECEMBER 2016: #1 best selling pet camera on Amazon.

2.alt: The Furbo dog camera's barking alert saved my dog from carbon monoxide poisoning
2.title: Furbo’s Barking Alert saved my dog from carbon monoxide poisoning!
2.short: I kept getting Barking Alert notifications
2.content: I kept getting Barking Alert notifications from Furbo so I checked in on my dog. I then heard that our carbon monoxide alarm was going off! So glad that I had Furbo to notify me, or else I may not have come home to my dog alive. You can see in the video my dog was sneezing and did not like the smell.
2.author: - Kobe’s loving dog mom

0.heading: Can I cancel my Furbo Nanny Cam Bundle subscription?
0.content: Yes, you may cancel your Furbo Nanny Cam Bundle subscription anytime after 3 months. After the first 3 months, please contact our Customer Support team to cancel your subscription.

1.heading: What happens after I cancel my subscription?
1.content: After canceling, you can continue using the subscription until the end of your current billing period. After your subscription expires, your Furbo Dog Camera will be remotely deactivated and you’ll permanently lose access to the Furbo Dog Camera and the Furbo Dog Nanny service. You’ll have 30 days to return the Furbo Dog Camera to us. Once you cancel your subscription, we will send you an email with detailed instructions on how to return your Furbo.

2.heading: Do I have to return the Furbo Dog Camera after canceling my subscription?
2.content: Yes, you are required to return your Furbo Dog Camera to our warehouse via UPS or Fedex within 30 days after your subscription expires. We’ll send you an email with detailed instructions on how to ship Furbo back to us when you cancel your subscription. Failure to return the Furbo to us will result in a penalty of US$179 + tax.

3.heading: What is the Hardware Lifetime Warranty?
3.content: As long as you are subscribed to Furbo Nanny Cam Bundle, you will have lifetime warranty for your Furbo Dog Camera. In the case that your Furbo breaks, you can replace it with a quality-checked, renewed Furbo Dog Camera.

right.2: Camera: 1080p HD, 160° wide-angle lens, 4x digital zoom, automatic night vision
right.3: Audio: Built-in speaker, high quality microphone
right.5: Recommended treat: Round shaped treats with a diameter around 0.4 inches(1cm)

0.heading: How can Furbo keep my dog safe?
0.content: Furbo has saved over 500 dogs! Furbo will send you alerts of any important events happening at home, so you can be alerted of any emergencies in real time.

1.heading: How is Furbo different from generic security cameras?
1.content: Every element of Furbo is designed for dogs. Furbo is recommended by vets and dog trainers and can help alleviate your dog’s separation anxiety. Furbo's life-saving Smart Alerts can detect dog-related events and alert you about what’s happening at home.

2.heading: Do I have to pay for Furbo Dog Nanny?
2.content: No, Furbo Dog Nanny is an OPTIONAL subscription service that you can choose to purchase after your 30-day FREE trial, included with your purchase, is over.

3.heading: What treats can I use?
3.content: We recommend using dry, firm and round treats that are 0.5 inches for best treat-toss results!

4.heading: Is Furbo suitable for large dogs?
4.content: During the development process of Furbo, many dogs of different sizes, breeds, and personalities tested out the sturdiness of Furbo. That’s why you will find a fixed 3M doubled-sided tape on the bottom of your Furbo, to prevent it from being knocked over. We recommend placing Furbo 12-20 inches above the floor (or based on the height of your dog and its mobility).

5.heading: What is the return policy?
5.content: If you are not fully satisfied with your Furbo, you will have 30 days to return or exchange your Furbo.

6.heading: Does Furbo come with a warranty?
6.content: Yes! Furbo comes with a one year warranty starting from the date of shipping.

user_reviews.title: 10,000+ User Reviews
user_reviews.subtitle: What pawrents are saying on Amazon.

0.author: Christopher
0.quote: Great for keeping track of your pup while at work
0.short: After purchasing this as a gift previously, I finally got around to purchasing this for myself, and boy was that a good decision!
0.content: After purchasing this as a gift previously, I finally got around to purchasing this for myself, and boy was that a good decision! My dog loves it, and it's extremely comforting knowing that my dog is safe at home while I'm away at work!

1.author: Larry Towne
1.short: This is by far the best interactive pet camera ever. While my pup is home alone I can check on her, give her a treat or just make sure she's safe.
1.content: This is by far the best interactive pet camera ever. While my pup is home alone I can check on her, give her a treat or just make sure she's safe. She loves when the light changes color, running from wherever she is lounging to wait for a treat and I can make great videos of her at the same time. I would recommend this for any pet owner. It's fantastic!

2.author: Amazon Customer
2.short: I don't typically write reviews but last week Furbo actually saved my dog's life! My puppy was home alone and I got a Dog Activity Alert from Furbo.
2.content: I don't typically write reviews but last week Furbo actually saved my dog's life! My puppy was home alone and I got a Dog Activity Alert from Furbo. When I looked at the camera, I saw that she had pulled a bag of treats from the counter and it was over her head and she was stuck. I was able to keep her engaged with me by throwing treats using Furbo while I rushed home to help. Without Furbo my puppy would have suffocated in that bag. So thankful for this camera!

0.author: Elizabeth
0.short: I have 7 dogs and most are seniors, so I need to know what is going on throughout the day in case someone is sick. Furbo is PAWSOME!
0.content: I have 7 dogs and most are seniors, so I need to know what is going on throughout the day in case someone is sick. Furbo is PAWSOME! I love the clarity and I know what is going on with the notifications to my phone. I can see them anytime I want and see that they are OK! Peace of mind is everything!

1.author: Kuei Chih Sun
1.short: I was always concerned leaving my puppy home alone because he will cry a lot.. When I got Furbo, things got much better!
1.content: I was always concerned leaving my puppy home alone because he will cry a lot.. When I got Furbo, things got much better! Furbo sent me notifications to my phone when he was crying, so I would log on and talk to him right away. This changed everything!! My puppy knows I'm always there, so his separation anxiety is getting better. I feel much more relieved!

2.author: Dustin Tremellen
2.short: I bought Furbo thinking it would just be something fun to see what my dog does while I'm away. Little did I know it would help in a dog medical emergency!
2.content: I bought Furbo thinking it would just be something fun to see what my dog does while I'm away. Little did I know it would help in a dog medical emergency! While I was away, my dog somehow got into her medication and ate a whole week's worth of pills. When I got home there was vomit everywhere. I was able to check Furbo's recordings to see what time she had eaten all the pills, this information helped greatly when I called animal poison control and go to the emergency vet! So thankful for Furbo!

1.heading: What happens after I cancel my subscription?
1.content: After canceling, you can continue using the subscription until the end of your current billing period. After your subscription expires, your Furbo Dog Camera will be remotely deactivated and you’ll permanently lose access to the Furbo Dog Camera and the Furbo Dog Nanny service. You’ll have 30 days to return the Furbo Dog Camera to us. Once you cancel your subscription, we will send you an email with detailed instructions on how to return your Furbo.

2.heading: Do I have to return the Furbo Dog Camera after canceling my subscription?
2.content: Yes, you are required to return your Furbo Dog Camera to our warehouse via UPS or Fedex within 30 days after your subscription expires. We’ll send you an email with detailed instructions on how to ship Furbo back to us when you cancel your subscription. Failure to return the Furbo to us will result in a penalty of US$179 + tax.

3.heading: What is the Hardware Lifetime Warranty?
3.content: As long as you are subscribed to Furbo Nanny Cam Bundle, you will have lifetime warranty for your Furbo Dog Camera. In the case that your Furbo breaks, you can replace it with a quality-checked, renewed Furbo Dog Camera.

faas.meta_title: Treat-Tossing Dog Camera & 2 Way Audio | Free Shipping | Furbo Dog Camera
faas.meta_description: Furbo is an interactive dog camera with a connected app that lets you see, talk, and even give treats to your dog when you're away. Get free shipping!
